bibl.title: Pharaonic Egyptian Elements in the Decorative Arts of Alexandria during the Hellenistic and Roman Periods.
bibl.note: On the reasons contributing to the diminution of pharaonic minor arts in Ptolemaic and Roman Egypt.

bibl.title: Alexandria and Alexandrianism. Papers Delivered at a Symposium Organized by The J. Paul Getty Museum and The Getty Center for the History of Art and the Humanities and Held at the Museum. April 22-25, 1993

bibl.seg: BIANCHI Robert Steven, Pharaonic Egyptian Elements in the Decorative Arts of Alexandria during the Hellenistic and Roman Periods.

Alexandria and Alexandrianism. Papers Delivered at a Symposium Organized by The J. Paul Getty Museum and The Getty Center for the History of Art and the Humanities and Held at the Museum. April 22-25, 1993 (Malibu, 1996) pp. 191-202, 3 figg.
On the reasons contributing to the diminution of pharaonic minor arts in Ptolemaic and Roman Egypt.
